136d2a19-4032-4a4e-b4cb-9589025609f8.name: 战斗反射
136d2a19-4032-4a4e-b4cb-9589025609f8.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

fd0c21d5-b27c-478e-a637-b6566dea3704.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

2a7d212b-5ab4-4b5f-abde-e47c49f80a1d.name: 高痛阈
2a7d212b-5ab4-4b5f-abde-e47c49f80a1d.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

b0557ab9-38d9-4684-b32a-ee8dcfc2a6b7.name: 幸运
b0557ab9-38d9-4684-b32a-ee8dcfc2a6b7.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

cdd87db4-c86a-48f0-8d8c-10ea12297b1c.name: Luck, Extraordinary
cdd87db4-c86a-48f0-8d8c-10ea12297b1c.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

27d79971-7279-4fd0-9cd7-c6460230ef69.name: 标志性装备
27d79971-7279-4fd0-9cd7-c6460230ef69.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

b63f60fb-321d-4448-b07b-b831b7b7b540.name: Talent (Seafarer)
b63f60fb-321d-4448-b07b-b831b7b7b540.notes: And adds to Carousing and Streetwise rolls made in port towns.

a30cce4d-60c6-4908-b822-d18e885debb8.name: Reaction Bonus
a30cce4d-60c6-4908-b822-d18e885debb8.notes: Sailors, pirates, and aquatic races sympathetic to sea travel

eddbefff-6210-428d-b2dc-364acd97f1e6.name: 可选增益
eddbefff-6210-428d-b2dc-364acd97f1e6.notes: Bonus to resist seasicknes and reduce unfamiliarity penalties for system on an appropriate boat or ship. Bonus to Carousing and Streetwise in port towns.

f23284f1-ba47-40a6-b851-db19c5a68343.name: Weapon Bond
f23284f1-ba47-40a6-b851-db19c5a68343.notes: +1 to effective skill when using @a specific weapon@

d5f27be2-370e-4eae-8e34-bc07f29472bd.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

4cf9c582-5aa8-442e-89d5-a7e292714356.name: 期待陪伴
4cf9c582-5aa8-442e-89d5-a7e292714356.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

a1d4ee4c-db09-44af-8107-50eb0b0263dc.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
a1d4ee4c-db09-44af-8107-50eb0b0263dc.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

ebeed204-e81d-441a-a3ad-199a874a67d0.name: 执念
ebeed204-e81d-441a-a3ad-199a874a67d0.notes: Become the best  swordsman in the world!

b4221d53-7b77-4f5a-bfdd-a927b034d203.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

fabbc2cd-77f5-42e1-9cfa-97fbcafdd69e.name: Or 1 point to raise one of those skills or any one-point primary or secondary skill by a level.
